title: What is the United Cup semi-finals schedule?
description: The United Cup semi-finals schedule has been released. Kazakhstan will face Poland at 10:30 a.m. in Sydney before the United States takes on Czechia in the evening. The United States is the lone former champion remaining in the competition (2023), while Poland held championship points inside Ken Rosewall Arena last year. View the full Saturday order of play below. [ATP APP] Kazakhstan vs. Poland - 10:30 a.m. Alexander Shevchenko (KAZ) vs. Hubert Hurkacz (POL) Elena Rybakina (KAZ) vs. Iga Swiatek (POL) Elena Rybakina/Alexander Shevchenko (KAZ) vs. Iga Swiatek/Hubert Hurkacz (POL)  United States vs. Italy or Czechia - 5:30 p.m. Coco Gauff (USA) vs. Karolina Muchova (CZE) Not Before 7 p.m. Taylor Fritz (USA) vs. Tomas Machac (CZE) Coco Gauff/Taylor Fritz (USA) vs. Karolina Muchova/Tomas Machac (CZE)  [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:
United Cup

Learn when Saturday's ties will take place

January 03, 2025

Peter Staples/ATP Tour

Coco Gauff and Taylor Fritz meet with ballkids in Sydney on Friday ahead of the United States' United Cup semi-final on Saturday. By ATP/WTA Staff

The United Cup semi-finals schedule has been released. Kazakhstan will face Poland at 10:30 a.m. in Sydney before the United States takes on Czechia in the evening.

The United States is the lone former champion remaining in the competition (2023), while Poland held championship points inside Ken Rosewall Arena last year.

View the full Saturday order of play below.

Kazakhstan vs. Poland - 10:30 a.m.
Alexander Shevchenko (KAZ) vs. Hubert Hurkacz (POL)
Elena Rybakina (KAZ) vs. Iga Swiatek (POL)
Elena Rybakina/Alexander Shevchenko (KAZ) vs. Iga Swiatek/Hubert Hurkacz (POL) 

United States vs. Italy or Czechia - 5:30 p.m.
Coco Gauff (USA) vs. Karolina Muchova (CZE)

Not Before 7 p.m.
Taylor Fritz (USA) vs. Tomas Machac (CZE)
Coco Gauff/Taylor Fritz (USA) vs. Karolina Muchova/Tomas Machac (CZE)
